Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV4
Test.Name: No response on fourth request
Test.Description: Check NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV4 test when DUT return no response on fourth request.

Test.TestName: NVT SET DNS CONFIGURATION - DNSMANUAL IPV4
Test.Name: [BUG.1] DNS Issue: additional SearchDomain
Test.Description:
[BUG.1] DNS Issue
In test cases 6.2.6 and 6.2.7 (Set DNS Configuration) the tool will expect the SearchDomain values to be removed. This is the recommended behavior, but the tool will incorrectly fail this test case for NVT’s that keep the SearchDomain values. Vendors are therefore allowed to send a Test Report for Declaration of Conformance where these test cases fail because of this issue. Note, the SearchDomain values might be mandatory to remove in future releases of the tool.
